name: actinin alpha 3

kegg.name: Arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy - Homo sapiens (human)

pid.name: Signaling events mediated by focal adhesion kinase

summary: This gene encodes a member of the alpha-actin binding protein gene family. The encoded protein is primarily expressed in skeletal muscle and functions as a structural component of sarcomeric Z line. This protein is involved in crosslinking actin containing thin filaments. An allelic polymorphism in this gene results in both coding and non-coding variants; the reference genome represents the coding allele. The non-functional allele of this gene is associated with elite athlete status. [provided by RefSeq, Apr 2024].
